title: Quick Select
subtitle: Find the k-th smallest (or largest) element in an unsorted array
code: left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
middle = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
additional_information: Quick Select uses a partitioning approach similar to Quick Sort to efficiently find the k-th order statistic without fully sorting the array.
